DOC.brief_summary: The aim international study describe short- long-term ( i.e . 2 year follow index event ) antithrombotic management pattern ( AMPs ) patient hospitalize acute coronary syndrome ( ST segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) , Non-ST-Segment Elevation Acute Coronary Syndrome ( NSTE-ACS ) ) , document impact AMPs clinical outcome , economic variable quality life 'real-life ' set compare site , country region .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating How Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome Are Managed During 2 Years After Discharge
